item.title: These are 7 ways you know you’re in Survival Mode
item.description: You can’t calm the storm, so stop trying. What you can do is calm yourself. The storm will pass.” —Timber Hawkeye Hi, guys. Welcome to today’s live video. My name is Chris Lindsay. Today I wanted to cover seven ways you know if you’re in survival mode. I’m just going to jump straight into it. These are basically signals from your body or things that you could pick up on.

item.title: Prescribing Nature
item.description: Hi. Thanks for joining me on today’s live video. My name is Chris Lindsay. This is the third video in the series on how to get out of survival mode. Today I want to talk about prescribing yourself nature. I had a friend who shared with me an interesting post about doctors in Shetland prescribing nature to their patients. Instead of describing them a drug or pill, they were prescribed getting out into nature.
